public interface BaseRepositoryCustom<T>
Base custom repository interface providing selective attribute update functionality. Enables fine-grained control over entity property updates based on annotation-driven permission levels.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<Class<? extends Annotation>>
    getUpdatePropertyLevels(T existingEntity)
    Determines the property-level update permissions for the current user context.
    T
    saveOnlyAttributes(T newEntity, T existingEntity, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses)
    Saves only specific attributes of an entity based on property-level update permissions.

  • Method Details

    • saveOnlyAttributes

      T saveOnlyAttributes(T newEntity, T existingEntity, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses) throws Exception
      Saves only specific attributes of an entity based on property-level update permissions. Uses annotation-based access control to determine which fields can be modified by the current user.
      Parameters:
      newEntity - the entity containing the new values to be saved
      existingEntity - the current entity from the database, null for new entities
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - set of annotation classes that define update permission levels
      Returns:
      the saved entity with updated attributes
      Throws:
      Exception - if the save operation fails, validation errors occur, or security constraints are violated

    • getUpdatePropertyLevels

      Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> getUpdatePropertyLevels(T existingEntity)
      Determines the property-level update permissions for the current user context. Analyzes user roles and entity state to return applicable annotation classes for field-level access control.
      Parameters:
      existingEntity - the existing entity to determine update permissions for
      Returns:
      set of annotation classes representing the user's update permission levels
